definition: surname Xue/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.chinese: 让我们请教埃文，薛定谔吧。

sentences.english: What is the solution to the Schr?dinger equation?
sentences.chinese: 那薛定谔方程的解是什么？

sentences.english: Standard form of Higher-Order Nonlinear Schrdinger equation is solved numerically.
sentences.chinese: 数值求解了标准化高阶修正非线性薛定谔方程。

sentences.english: The Schr?dinger equation is a linear equation.
sentences.chinese: 薛定谔方程是一个线性方程。

sentences.english: The scheme for preparing the Schrodinger cat states is proposed in the strong excitation regime of the ion trap.
sentences.chinese: 提出在离子阱的强激发区制备薛定谔猫态的方案。

sentences.english: The study of Schrödinger's cat can help us to understand the nature of quantum mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 对薛定谔猫的研究，有助于我们理解量子力学的本质。

sentences.english: psi The solution of the Schr?dinger equation is psi, a wavefunction.
sentences.chinese: 那薛定谔方程的解是什么，是，一个波函数。

sentences.english: Schrödinger himself argued that the wavefunction represented a real, physical object.
sentences.chinese: 薛定谔自己则声称，波动方程代表了真实的物理对象。

sentences.english: It is shown any states of harmonic oscillator are SCS.
sentences.chinese: 证明谐振子的任何状态都是薛定谔相干态。

sentences.english: Moreover, it is Liouville integrable and can be reduced to the well-known nonlinear Schrdinger equations.
sentences.chinese: 另外，这一族方程可约化为著名的非线性薛定谔方程。
德布罗意，海森堡和薛定谔。
埃文，薛定谔也是澳大利亚人。

sentences.english: Optimizing the fidelity of Schrodinger cat states of quantum teleportation.
sentences.chinese: 优化薛定谔猫态量子隐形传态的保真度。
之后薛定谔是怎么做的呢？

sentences.english: The time-dependent Schroedinger equation is rather formidable looking.
sentences.chinese: 含时间的薛定谔方程似乎是令人生畏的。
这就是薛定谔的方程式。

definition: Werner Heisenberg (1901-1976), German physicist/also written 海森伯

pinyin: bu4 que4 ding4 xing4 yuan2 li3

definition: Ludwig Boltzmann (1844-1906), Austrian physicist and philosopher
Henri Poincaré (1854-1912), French mathematician, physician and philosopher
